document_data.name: Darun Lockmaster
document_data.mainbody: '''Darun Lockmaster''' was the only [[dwarven]] councilor within the [[Dale Council]] of [[High Dale]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was known as a cheerful and intelligent man, as well as an extremely skilled armorsmith and locksmith. He was known to craft the finest locks, as well as accompanying picks, in all of the [[Dalelands]].
